name: Central Deep Water Station
notes: Deepest point of volcanic caldera lake, relatively stable water quality

name: Southern Tourism Zone (Kedisan)
notes: Heavy tourism pressure, restaurant wastewater, hotel discharge area

name: Pura Ulun Danu Sacred Water Zone
notes: Sacred water source for temple ceremonies, protected by traditional authority

name: Northern Agricultural Runoff Zone
notes: Crater slope agricultural runoff, terracing erosion control area

name: KJA Floating Cage Cluster
notes: Floating cage aquaculture zone, opposed by temple and Desa Adat

name: Irrigation Outlet (Subak Distribution)
notes: Water outlet point for downstream subak irrigation network across Bali
